00043 #define __vtkPSSInterface_h

00051 
00056 class VTK_ESQUI_BIOMECHANICS_EXPORT vtkPSSInterface : public vtkDeformationModel
00057 {
00058 public:
00060     vtkTypeRevisionMacro(vtkPSSInterface, vtkDeformationModel);
00062     static vtkPSSInterface* New();
00063     const char *GetClassName() {return "vtkPSSInterface";};
00065     void PrintSelf(ostream& os, vtkIndent indent);
00066 
00068     virtual int RequestData(vtkInformation *, vtkInformationVector **, vtkInformationVector *);
00069 
00071 
00083     virtual void Init();
00084 
00086     vtkSetMacro(DistanceCoefficient, double);
00088     vtkSetMacro(DampingCoefficient, double);
00090     vtkSetMacro(SpringCoefficient, double);
00092     vtkSetMacro(Mass, double);
00094     vtkSetMacro(DeltaT, double);
00096     vtkSetMacro(RigidityFactor, int);
00098     vtkSetMacro(SolverType, vtkMotionEquationSolver::MotionEquationSolverType);
00099 
00100 protected:
00101     vtkPSSInterface();
00102     ~vtkPSSInterface();
00103 
00104 
00106     vtkParticleSpringSystem * ParticleSpringSystem;
00107 
00108     // PSS specific parameters
00110     double DistanceCoefficient;
00112 
00118     double DampingCoefficient;
00120 
00123     double SpringCoefficient;
00125 
00129     double Mass;
00131 
00135     double DeltaT;
00137 
00142     int RigidityFactor;
00143 
00145 
00152     vtkMotionEquationSolver::MotionEquationSolverType SolverType;
00153     
00154 private:
00155     vtkPSSInterface(const vtkPSSInterface&);  // Not implemented.
00156     void operator=(const vtkPSSInterface&);  // Not implemented.
00157 };
